page.title: 07DARNFORD BROOK-POETRY
page.content: On Sunday 9th June,when we were staying at Lower Darnford Farm,we went to look at Colliersford Gutter,which runs out of Wildmoor Pool.We wrote words about the stream which we used in our poems:- {Clean silent }*{The stream narrows { power }*{And the rushing {Flows strongly }* {water {Bending stems }*{Slips smoothly over {Eating at the }*{Splashing and { banks }* {bubbling {Sweeping over }*{Tumbling over rocks { rocks }*{Until it reaches {Crashing down, }* {wider parts {Bubbling and }*{Slowing,rippling { foaming }* {trickling,calm {Like the sea. }*{Then faster as the * {banks come in. * Lisa Kynaston * Lucy Evans (10) * <9>
